thread.title: VIDEO: Reporter Tricks Students About Betsy DeVos’ Policies by Leaving Out Her Name
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Reporter Tricks Students About Betsy DeVos’ Policies by Leaving Out Her Name

author: Harris
title: VIDEO: Reporter Tricks Students About Betsy DeVos’ Policies by Leaving Out Her Name
text:
Rape Survivor Encourages Women to Carry a Firearm for Self-Protection 
“I think she’s grossly unqualified,” one student said. Another commented that when she goes to bed at night, she wonders “what Betsy DeVos is up to. Probably destroying the education system of America, I think that’s what’s going on.” 
Another student erroneously commented that she didn’t know how DeVos got “elected,” proving the point that these kids have no education when it comes to the secretary of education and how the confirmation process works. 
But wait, there’s more:   
Though the students’ opinions of DeVos were decidedly negative and completely unoriginal, the reporter did something shocking that changed the students’ minds about DeVos, only they didn’t realize it until it was too late. 
The reporter began listing programs that DeVos originated, like the school choice policy, but did not mention that DeVos was the one behind them. 
All of a sudden the students had great things to say about the programs. 
Watch the clip below:
